channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Deadly April rainfall in US South and Midwest was intensified by climate change, scientists say
item.description: Human-caused climate change intensified deadly rainfall in Kentucky, Tennessee, Arkansas and other states in early April and made it more likely to occur.

item.title: Civil rights leaders say acquittals in Tyre Nichols’ death highlight the need for police reform
Smokey Robinson’s lawyer says rape allegations against him are ‘vile’ and ‘false’
